name: commodity-prices
title: Commodity prices
descriptions: Monthly prices of most commodities from 1980 to 2016 years

licenses.name: ODC-PDDL-1.0
licenses.title: Open Data Commons Public Domain Dedication and License v1.0

fields.name: All Commodity Price Index
fields.description: includes both Fuel and Non-Fuel Price Indices

fields.name: Non-Fuel Price Index
fields.description: includes Food and Beverages and Industrial Inputs Price Indices

fields.name: Food and Beverage Price Index
fields.description: includes Food and Beverage Price Indices

fields.name: Food Price Index
fields.description: includes Cereal, Vegetable Oils, Meat, Seafood, Sugar, Bananas, and Oranges Price Indices

fields.name: Beverage Price Index
fields.description: includes Coffee, Tea, and Cocoa

fields.name: Industrial Inputs Price Index
fields.description: includes Agricultural Raw Materials and Metals Price Indices

fields.name: Agricultural Raw Materials Index
fields.description: includes Timber, Cotton, Wool, Rubber, and Hides Price Indices

fields.name: Metals Price Index
fields.description: includes Copper, Aluminum, Iron Ore, Tin, Nickel, Zinc, Lead, and Uranium Price Indices

fields.name: Fuel Energy Index
fields.description: includes Crude oil (petroleum), Natural Gas, and Coal Price Indices
